title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the security standards and regulations to be monitored (e.g., HIPAA, PCI-DSS, SOC 2, ISO 27001), the organization's compliance policies, the desired reporting mechanisms (e.g., dashboards, alerts, reports), the monitoring mechanisms (e.g., log analysis, network monitoring, configuration management), and the integration points with existing systems (e.g., SIEM, ITSM, GRC tools). Also, identify the stakeholders and their roles in the project, and determine the project's success criteria.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, and integration points with existing systems.

title: Develop Data Collection and Monitoring Components
description: Implement the components responsible for collecting data from various sources and monitoring compliance against the defined standards and regulations.

title: Build Reporting and Alerting Mechanisms
description: Develop the components responsible for generating compliance reports and alerting stakeholders in case of non-compliance.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Ensure proper security measures and access controls are in place to protect sensitive data and system components.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the system components.
dependencies: Develop Data Collection and Monitoring Components

title: Conduct System Testing and Validation
description: Perform comprehensive testing and validation of the system, including functional, integration, and performance testing.
dependencies: Develop Data Collection and Monitoring Components

title: Prepare User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Create user guides, training materials, and other documentation to support the deployment and ongoing operation of the system.

title: Deploy and Monitor the System
description: Deploy the system in the production environment, monitor its performance, and address any issues or non-compliance incidents.
dependencies: Prepare User Documentation and Training Materials
